long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ai Code Editor is an AI-powered Chrome extension that helps you modify HTML, CSS, and JS code using natural language descriptions. Simply paste your code, describe the changes you want, and let the AI transform or create your code. 

Perfect for web developers, designers, and content editors who want to make quick modifications without manual coding.

Key Features:
- Natural language HTML, CSS, JS editing
- Dark/light mode support
- Clipboard integration
- Persistent state between sessions
- Real-time preview
